Content.Text:
<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right, <MYNAME>, it's time for a farm-fresh
morning!

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Today, I'm going to teach you how to take care
of cows.
<PAGE>
There's a lot to learn, but don't worry, you'll do
fine. Taking care of animals can be very
rewarding.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's head to the barn.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ohoho, isn't she cute? This is Hanako, one of
my cows.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Go on and pet her. It's important to show your
affection for animals, you know. They can tell if
you like them.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oho ho ho! It looks like Hanako's really taking to
you!
<PAGE>
Give your cows some love like this every day,
and in turn, they'll give you delicious milk.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, there are three major chores for taking
proper care of cows. You have to feed them,
brush them and milk them.
<PAGE>
Let me give you the tools you'll need to take care
of them. Here you are, dearie.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
These are some of my old tools, but they'll get
the job done, sure enough.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oho, you're quite welcome! I'm glad you like
them.
<PAGE>
All right. First let's start with feeding cows.
<PAGE>
Cows eat fodder. You can take some from that
fodder bin over there.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Stand in front of the fodder bin and <BLUE>press the A
Button</BLUE> to grab an armful of fodder.
<PAGE>
This bin is connected to the <BLUE>Storage</BLUE> trunk in
your house, you see.
<PAGE>
That means if there isn't any fodder in the bin,
you don't have any left in your <BLUE>Storage</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
If that happens, all you need do is put more
fodder into your Storage. Then, the bin will be
full again.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Next, let's talk about brushing.
<PAGE>
First, equip your brush. Then, stand next to the
cow and <BLUE>hold the A Button</BLUE> to brush it.
<PAGE>
Once the cow is clean, it will start to sparkle.
That tells you that you're all done.
<PAGE>
Remember, cleanliness is healthiness. Be sure to
keep your cows clean, or they may get sick.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Finally, let's go over milking cows.
<PAGE>
Equip the milker, then stand next to the cow and
<BLUE>hold the A Button</BLUE> to milk them.
<PAGE>
Keep <BLUE>holding the A Button</BLUE> until the bottle icon
in the bottom left corner of your screen is full.
<PAGE>
Once that icon has filled up, you will get a bottle
of fresh milk.
<PAGE>
Now, I know that was a lot to take in at once,
but do you think you got the main points? Good
luck, dearie.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You haven't put any fodder in the feeding area
yet, dear. Just put it right there in the middle of
the floor.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The cow isn't totally clean yet, so keep on
brushing.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The cow still has milk left to give, so keep on
going.
<PAGE>
Be sure to <BLUE>press the Y Button</BLUE> to put away the
item you have equipped before picking up the
milk bottles.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My, my! And where are you off to in such a
hurry? You're not done here yet.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well done, dear. Do you understand how to take
care of cows now?
<PAGE>
I'll put some books about cow care on your
bookshelf, so just browse through them if you
have any questions.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There now, you've finished all your farmer
training. You took to it like a fish to water, dear.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Miss Veronica will be visiting first thing
tomorrow morning, so be sure not to stay out
too late.
<PAGE>
Here's your allowance for today. I'll be in the
house if you need anything.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Pick up an armful of fodder from the fodder bin
and <BLUE>press the A Button</BLUE> to toss it into the feeding
area.
I got an <BLUE>Old Brush</BLUE> and an <BLUE>Old Milker</BLUE>!
<BLUE>Feeding</BLUE> was added to your shelf.
<BLUE>Brushing</BLUE> was added to your shelf.
<BLUE>Using the Milker</BLUE> was added to your shelf.

Fodder: Pick up an armful of fodder.
  <BLUE>Press the A Button</BLUE> near the feeding area.
Brushing: Equip the brush.
  <BLUE>Hold the A Button</BLUE> when next to a cow.
Milking: Equip the milker
  <BLUE>Hold the A Button</BLUE> when next to a cow.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My, my! How'd you manage to fill your bag
already? Try organizing it to make room for the
two new tools.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My, my! It seems your bag is full. I'll put the
tools into your toolbox, and the rest into your
storage.
Received 500G.
